segments.text: I think this is a classic family kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's drying plates, so domestic and routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sink's overflowing though, what a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water down the front, puddle expanding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids at the cabinet, boy on the stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got the cookies, sharing with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaky snack time behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open to a beautiful garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Despite the risks, it feels endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope it ends without injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor cabinets taking the water hit.
segments.speaker: PAR
